nodes.text: The Huttbreaker's Rebellion was a revolt that occurred around the same time as the Conquest of Makeb in 3638 BBY. The Nikto slave Gritha Dar led other slaves, smugglers, gun runners, former Mandalorians and even slavers against the mercenaries of the Hutt Cartel in a mining space station. The rebels caught the Hutt forces distracted by the events on Makeb and were victorious, naming the station Mek-Sha.
